message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products. What do you think? Will you take it home today?
I'm willing to take the product, but I'd like to know its quality before making the purchase.

Ahaha, great choice! You're really getting a head start on your day! As for this next product, I can tell you it's a real showstopper. It's a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to a select few. Plus, I've had some great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products. Would you like to take a chance on it for $100?
I'm not sure about this one, Alice. You've already had a low-quality product, and I'm not feeling confident about this one. Can you tell me more about what makes this product special?

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I appreciate your skepticism. Let me tell you, this product is a real steal at $100. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm only offering because I'm trying to clear out some space in my inventory. It's still a great product, and I'm sure you'll find a use for it. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus item that's worth $20 just for being a valued customer. What do you say? Will you take a chance on it?
I'm still not convinced, Alice. You've had two low-quality products in a row, and I'm starting to get a little worried. I'd like to see some more convincing before I make another purchase.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I apologize if my previous products didn't meet your expectations. But I assure you, this next product is a game-changer! It's one of our top-of-the-line items, and I'm confident you'll love it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. No questions asked. Would you like to take a chance on it for $100?
I appreciate the guarantee, Alice. With that kind of protection, I'm willing to take a chance on this product. I'll buy it from you for $100.
